description:
Wu Daoying, a young man who is bent on finding monsters, quits his job in anger after getting tired of the perfunctory daily routine of a yamen runner. He follows Qingxuan on the road of hunting monsters. In the subsequent encounters with various monsters, he gradually breaks through himself, strengthens his beliefs, and finally overcomes the difficulties. He uses courage and compassion to achieve personal growth and save others.
　　The work is adapted from the novel "Wu Chengen`s Monster Hunting".
source: movie.douban.com/googletranslate

REGULAR.description:
Wu Daoying is a simple soldier in the military guard of the city of Huai An. Strange things have been happening in the city for three months, and he has a bad feeling about what might be behind it.
Source: Crunchyroll

Wu Daoying`s ominous suspicion has been confirmed. Beneath King Linggan`s temple, the evil that is behind all the child disappearances lies dormant. With great effort and unexpected help, Wu Daoying manages to defeat the demon.
Source: Crunchyroll

Wu Daoying hasn`t been traveling for long with Qing Xuan, his new travel companion and teacher, and they already encounter two female bandits along their way. However, it seems the bandits are after more than just their valuables…
Source: Crunchyroll

Wu Daoying persuades Silberhorn to make a deal with him so that her wish can be fulfilled. But the plan unfolds very differently than she had imagined.
Source: Crunchyroll

Qing Xuan and Wu Daoying arrive in the city of Xi An, searching for the Sarira. But even here, things aren`t going smoothly…
Source: Crunchyroll

Gelbbraue lures them all into a trap, and suddenly Wu Daoying finds himself trapped in an illusion that mirrors his sad past.
Source: Crunchyroll

At a rest area on the Tuoluo estate, Wu Daoying and Qing Xuan take a break until they unexpectedly receive information about the thief who stole the Sarira.
Source: Crunchyroll

Wu Daoying has formed a friendship with the shy Nine-Headed Phoenix and happily travels with Qing Xuan to the next city. There`s a lot happening here due to the upcoming Ghost Festival, and Wu Daoying visits a temple with Qing Xuan to pray.
Source: Crunchyroll

The people of the city of Liangzhou are being attacked by the Soul-Eating Flower, and Qing Xuan separates from Wu Daoying. Desperately, he tries to stop the attack...
Source: Crunchyroll

Qing Xuan is led by the two demons, Qingfeng and Mingyue, to be the true culprit. However, Li Tang and Wu Daoying, who had followed him, cannot allow that...
Source: Crunchyroll

Qing Xuan is beaten by Zhenyuan, and Li Tang and Wu Daoying rush to his aid. But unfortunately, they can`t do much either.
Source: Crunchyroll

The battle seemed hopeless until Wu Daoying uncovered Qing Xuan`s secret. To escape the dire situation, Wu Daoying accepts the demon`s offer, who lived inside the Wandermonk.
Source: Crunchyroll
